message.body: How much crying is going on in Boston right now? Little bitches.
There's a level of indifference with the friends I'm staying with. I watched it last night and just laughed my assignment off
Er, ass. Thank you SwiftKey, ha ha
Totally the right call. And pedrioa is such a little bitch.
My friend ### just wants the series to end so she can go to lunch during the week again (she works near fenway)
